message.name: ERR_CREATESERVICEDELIVERYEVALUATION_FV_CREATED_BY_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: A user, created by must be entered.

message.name: ERR_CREATESERVICEDELIVERYEVALUATION_FV_CREATION_DATE_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: A creation date must be entered.

message.name: ERR_CREATESDCRITERIONEVALUATION_FV_SERVICEDELIVERYEVALUATION_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: A service delivery evaluation must be entered.

message.name: ERR_CREATESDCRITERIONEVALUATION_FV_SERVICEOFFERING_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: A service offering must be entered.

message.name: ERR_CREATESDCRITERIONEVALUATION_FV_SOEVALUATIONCRITERION_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: A service offering evaluation criterion must be entered.

message.name: ERR_CANNOT_CREATE_XML_FOR_RENDERER
message.locale: Error, unable to create XML document for renderer.

message.name: INF_CANNOT_EVALUATE_SERVICE_NO_CRITERIA_SPECIFIED
message.locale: The service %1s cannot be evaluated as no criteria have been configured for this service.

message.name: ERR_NO_EVALUATION_DATA_SPECIFIED
message.locale: You must specify an evaluation rating for at least one of the specified criteria.

message.name: ERR_XRV_ACTIVE_SERVICE_DELIVERY_EVALUATION_FOR_CRITERION_EXISTS
message.locale: There is an existing active evaluation score for the evaluation criterion %1s for this service delivery.

message.name: INF_XRV_AVERAGE_SCORE_NOT_APPLICABLE_FOR_CRITERIA_WITHOUT_RESPONSE_SCORES
message.locale: An average score cannot be calculated for criteria which have no scores associated in administration.
